feed.title: AutoKitteh Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(sessions): parent close policy to abandon by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1224
  • fix(python): do not log execute reply by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1223
  • chore: upgrade webplatform by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1226
  • feat(salesforce): track and close grpc connections by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1228
  • refactor(oauth): better design to support private OAuth apps seamlessly by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1197
  • chore(slack)!: remove obsolete migration by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1229
  • fix(salesforce): refresh token in grpc client by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1230

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.13...v0.15.14

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • reproduce issue: pure python exception that is not picklable makes the runtime stuck by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1213
  • fix(salesforce): set system user in context by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1231
  • fix(oauth): private oauth config by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1232
  • chore: reduce log spam by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1234

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.14...v0.15.15

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(oauth): flaky unit test by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1235
  • fix(devserver): increase start timeout, verify namespace by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1233
  • fix(salesforce): simplify gRPC flow by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1237

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.15...v0.15.16

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(linear): slightly better logging of signature checks by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1239

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.16...v0.15.17

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(salesforce): reinit pubsub client on all errors, sleep + cosmetic tweaks by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1240

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.17...v0.15.18
